features: 320 Pages Thick Lined Journal: 160 sheets/320 lined paper notebook to provide you ample space to write. A5 size 5.75'' × 8.38'', perfect size for carrying around or put into your bag or purse.
100GSM Quality Paper: AHGXG college ruled journal adopt 100gsm thick paper, thicker 20% than normal, avoid ink bleeding through and feathering, suitable for most pens.

Faux Leather Hard Cover: The premium sturdy hard cover make the lined notebooks more durable and touched comfortably, and will help to protect the pages inside and provide a comfortable writing surface.

Humanized Design: ❶ Numbered pages, Divider sticky notes, Index Content pages, 2 Bookmarks to help you find important content faster ❷ Durable PU leather hardcover, protects ruled notebook from wear and tear, ❸ Back Inner pocket can holds notes, business cards, small gadgets, etc. ❹ Closes with an elastic band，Pen holder loop for any pen.

Great Use: AHGXG thick leather notebook perfect for business executives, office, work, home, college, students, adults, scientists, and people in many other fields.It can be used as personal writing journal, bullet journal, daily work journal, questionnaire journal, note taking journal and more. Best gift for school, children, friends or business colleagues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AHGXG Lined Journal Notebook Thick Journal - Records Everyday Bit of Your Life 160 sheets/ 320 Pages. There are enough pages for you to effectively record lectures and various notes for a year or more.Premium 100Gsm weight papers no worries about bleed-through or feathering.Sturdy PU Leather Hard Cover & Exquisite Binding Design makes the notebooks more durable.Each Journal comes with an Elastic Closure,2 Bookmarks,1 Back Pocket, and 2 Free Sticky Notes Dividers.

Divider Sticky Notes From color coding your documents to bookmarking important pages, these sticky notes will get you organized. And you can quickly and easily go back and retrieve information. Index Content 3 Pages of Content for indexing, fast and easy reference. 100GSM Premium Paper The archival-quality pages made from acid-free paper, ensuring long-lasting, and perfect to write and draw on, suit for most pens. 180° Lay Flat We have a careful and rigorous in-house bookbinding process, that allows the notebook 180° lay-flat and easy one-handed note-taking, provide a comfortable writing surface. 2 Bookmarks Bookmarks are more convenient and less damaging to the paper than folding books to register page numbers. Safety Round Corner Design Humanized and safe rounded corner design will not hurt children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Self-proclaimed notebook enthusiast approved
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect notebook! I purchased it for use at my job, property management. Loved it so much that I got a second one!Size: b5 & I love it. I can fit so many things on one page & it's not bulky or heavy, so having it in my bag doesn't hinder my ability carry it or pack more of my stuff in the bag alongsideThe pages are thick enough to handle felt tip fine liners and the spacing is just right.The numbered pages & index make ot perfect for my notes/as a reference book.Thr cover is a softer, but sturdy, leather-likr material that not only protects the pages, but enables you to easily fold if you need more space on your desk. The little strap hold it in place as well, which I've never been able to do with past notebooks.The pocket in the back is made of thick paper so it can hold quite a bit.It's an attractive notebook that helps me stay organized! Not to mention, I feel more confident with it at work because anytime I have one of those moments where you just can't seem to remember how to do something, it's right there for me to look through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is such a cute journal, i like the size of it (A5 which is the smallest one, it’s not too small but not huge either) and the quality of it is made really well, i was surprised to see it came with little sticky notes to make separate sections, and having a little pocket at the end is helpful. oh the pen holder on the side is nice too because i always loose my good pens. the pages itself are really good, it’s smooth to write on and for some reason the paper is really soft? i’ve never felt such soft paper before lol but i like the texture. overall very cute and nice to write in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a very nice notebook. Great paper quality and has many pages. I use it for note taking.I use a very inky pen and some pastel colored highlighter in it. The bleed through is barely noticeable. The paper feel smooth and cool, which I love. At the top corner of each page there is a place to write the date. Each page has a page number at the bottom. At the beginning of the notebook there is a table of contents. At the end of the notebook, there is a pocket/envelope where you can store paper. The notebook also came with a few colorful post-it page tabs.My favorite thing about this notebook is that the lines aren’t bold black, they are a very thin light black color.I’m considering buying the smaller version to journal in and to carry around by hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and Well Made
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this journal. Soft, flexible leather, sizable pages and plenty of space to use. As a journal junkie, this is really nice and purchased for a very special project I’m working on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good value for a journal and has lots of pages. Paper quality is nice and can handle just about any kind of ink pen you want to use. The cover is also flexible, which makes it a very versatile writing companion. I have lots of journals, but this one is just about perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fountain pen users: watch for ghosting and bleed
reviews.reviewText: My initial impressions.Pros:- Love the feel of the cover material and the paper.- Light, dotted lines are great.- Construction feels solid.- Great paper color for journalers who want to avoid cream paper.Cons:- There is heavy ghosting and mild bleed using even an EF fountain pen.- The flyleafs are glued pretty far out so using the first few (and I imagine last few) pages is a little awkward.Overall it seems like a solid journal for daily use as long as your fountain pens aren't too flowy. I haven't tested yet with any nib above an M. I will try to update after using my BB and stub nibs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good journal, lots of pages
reviews.reviewText: I love how hefty this journal is! The pink color is soooo cute! And the hardcover is nice and soft. It has a ton of pages and the strap to keep it closed is nice. It also has a place to put your pen. It also has a little folder in the back and inside were some sticky notes that it came with. The pages have lines and a little thing on top to put the date. The lines aren't very dark which I like so that way the focus is on the writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this notebook! It's sturdy, has lots of pages, and makes a perfect journal. I highly recommend it.
Tien hojas gruesas y es de buena calidad, me preguntan mucho donde la compre
It’s alright, can buy better things for a cheaper price. Definitely wouldn’t buy again
